title: Humble Bundle’s Choice membership is a great way to build a massive library of PC games for cheap — here’s why it’s worth $12 a month
dc:creator: Jeremy Jones
description:
As a long-time Humble Choice member, I've become one for life. Not only have I been able to download games that I'd been wanting, but I've also found many fantastic new titles that I wouldn't have bought otherwise...It also feels great to know that my monthly fee supports a good cause.

The post Humble Bundle’s Choice membership is a great way to build a massive library of PC games for cheap — here’s why it’s worth $12 a month appeared first on Ziff Davis.
content:encoded:
